entries.title: State to deliver more water to cities after heavy rain storms
entries.description: This month's massive rain storms and snowfall on the West Coast have had a positive side effect for over 27 million California residents.

entries.title: Top Islamic State leader killed in U.S. raid in Somalia, officials say
entries.description: Bilal al-Sudani, a top leader and organizer with the Islamic State, was killed in a risky U.S. military ground raid in northern Somalia, official said

entries.title: Tyre Nichols: a timeline of the investigation into his death
entries.description: The investigation into the death of Tyre Nichols continues, as five officers are charged in connection with his death.

entries.title: Officials: Deadly Chicago high-rise fire was accidental
entries.description: Chicago authorities say a deadly fire in a high-rise apartment building was caused by someone smoking in a bedroom

entries.title: Chipotle looks to hire 15,000 amid continuing labor shortage
entries.description: Restaurants are beginning the new year with a recurring problem: labor shortages

entries.title: Colorado baker loses appeal over transgender birthday cake
entries.description: The Colorado baker who won a partial U.S. Supreme Court victory after refusing to make a gay couple’s wedding cake because of his Christian faith has lost an appeal in his latest legal fight

entries.title: Suspect in NYC truck attack that killed 8 found guilty in terror trial
entries.description: Sayfullo Saipov pleaded not guilty to charges including murder in the aid of racketeering in connection with the 2017 terror attack that killed eight people.

entries.title: Sleepy RNC chair race turns into contentious 3-way contest over party's future
entries.description: RNC Chair Ronna McDaniel is the favorite in Friday's race, though she faces a challenge from attorney Harmeet Dhillon and a long-shot bid from My Pillow CEO Mike Lindell

entries.title: Ex-Florida police officers accused of beating homeless man
entries.description: Two former South Florida police officers turned themselves in to face felony charges over the beating of a homeless man who had been drinking outside a shopping center last month

entries.title: Survivor hopes to change sentencing laws for victims of child sex trafficking
entries.description: If passed, "Sara's Law" would allow judges to give reduced sentences to child survivors of sex trafficking.

entries.title: WATCH:  Huge iceberg breaks away in Antarctica
entries.description: A huge iceberg some 600 square miles — approximately the size of Oklahoma City — is seen calving from an ice shelf.

entries.title: Man shot dead after dog steps on hunting rifle
entries.description: A dog stepped on a gun in the backseat of a car, striking and killing a 30-year-old man in the front seat, Kansas authorities said.

entries.title: New US race, ethnicity standards proposed; first since '97
entries.description: A Middle Eastern and North African category would be added to U.S. federal surveys and censuses, and changes would be made to how Hispanics are able to self-identify

entries.title: Ex-police officers charged with murder in connection with Tyre Nichols' death
entries.description: The five Memphis police officers who were fired in connection with the death of Tyre Nichols during a traffic stop on Jan. 7 are now in custody.

entries.title: How DOJ turned the tables on hackers to disrupt $100M ransomware group
entries.description: Hive ransomware actors have "victimized" over 1,300 companies worldwide.

entries.title: 2 arrested for gunning down 11-year-old girl buying milk: Police
entries.description: Two men have been arrested in the slaying of 11-year-old Brexialee Torres-Ortiz, who was shot dead while walking home after getting milk.

entries.title: Walmart's Sam's Club to add 30 stores in next few years
entries.description: This marks the first expansion since 2017.

entries.title: Meetings with Lindh prompt move to revoke convict's release
entries.description: He was convicted as a teen of supporting the Islamic State group.

entries.title: Adam Schiff is running for California Senate seat
entries.description: Adam Schiff on Thursday announced he will run for California Sen. Dianne Feinstein's seat in 2024

entries.title: WATCH:  Joey peeks from mother's pouch
entries.description: After six months developing in its mother's pouch, a rare tree kangaroo joey is beginning to peek outside at its home in the Chester Zoo.

entries.title: Girl, 3, dies after Indiana apartment fire kills dad, sister
entries.description: A fire official says a 3-year-old girl has died more than two weeks after she was seriously injured in an Indianapolis apartment fire that killed her father and 15-month-old sister

entries.title: Fewer Americans file for jobless claims last week
entries.description: Applications for jobless aid in the U.S. fell by 6,000 last week.

entries.title: Man charged with setting fire to Planned Parenthood clinic
entries.description: An Illinois man has been arrested and charged for allegedly setting fire to a Planned Parenthood clinic, federal authorities said.

entries.title: Dow is cutting about 2,000 jobs, or 5% of workforce
entries.description: Materials science company Dow is cutting about 2,000 jobs, or approximately 5% of its global workforce, as part of an effort to reach $1 billion in cost savings this year

entries.title: Nobel laureate wants more to help probe Russian war crimes
entries.description: A Ukrainian human rights lawyer who shared last year’s Nobel Peace Prize is calling for more international investigative and legal help to deal with the staggering amount of war crimes cases since Russia invaded its neighbor almost a year ago

entries.title: WATCH:  Sacramento Zoo welcomes baby giraffe
entries.description: Newborn giraffe calf soaks up the motherly love after joining the herd at Sacramento Zoo.

entries.title: Feds announce massive takedown of fraudulent nursing diploma scheme
entries.description: A massive scheme to sell fraudulent nursing degree credentials has been brought down by a joint federal law enforcement operation, the DOJ announced Wednesday.

entries.title: WATCH:  India's daredevil military bikers perform outrageous stunts
entries.description: India's Corps of Signals perform daredevil formations at the country's Republic Day Parade.

entries.title: Monterey Park shooting suspect had no known connection to victims, police say
entries.description: The suspect involved in the Monterey Park shooting had no known connection to any of the victims that were killed in the shooting, police say.

entries.title: Andrew Tate appears for day two of forensic device searches
entries.description: Romanian prosecutors are continuing to search digital devices seized in the case of Andrew Tate, the influential internet personality who is detained in Romania on suspicion of organized crime and human trafficking

entries.title: Mother who attempted suicide accused of killing 2 children, injuring infant
entries.description: A Massachusetts woman is facing charges in the deaths of her two young children and the injury of her baby.

entries.title: Japan launches intel satellite to watch N. Korea, disasters
entries.description: Japan has successfully launched a rocket carrying a government intelligence-gathering satellite on a mission to watch movements at military sites in North Korea as part of Tokyo’s effort to build up its military capability

entries.title: SAP to cut up to 3,000 jobs worldwide, mulls Qualtrics sale
entries.description: Germany-based software company SAP says it's cutting up to 3,000 jobs worldwide, or about 2.5% of its workforce

entries.title: 8 confirmed dead in ship sinking off Japan and South Korea
entries.description: A Chinese official says eight people died in the sinking of a cargo ship in waters between Japan and South Korea

entries.title: Why California still has high gun violence despite strict firearms laws
entries.description: Even the state with some of the strictest gun laws can't keep gun violence away from its borders.

entries.title: GDP data to show if economy shrank at end of 2022
entries.description: GDP data will show whether economy grew or shrank at the end of 2022.

entries.title: 8 Palestinians killed after Israel storms West Bank refugee camp
entries.description: Eight Palestinians were killed when the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) reportedly stormed the Jenin refugee camp on the West Bank early Thursday morning.

entries.title: Israel's high-tech economic engine balks at govt policies
entries.description: Israel’s tech industry has long been the driving force behind the country’s economy

entries.title: Asian shares mixed on hopes for avoiding recession
entries.description: Global stock markets have risen amid hopes Western economies can avoid a recession despite higher interest rates to cool inflation

entries.title: Students threaten to sue DeSantis over rejection of African American studies course
entries.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis could face a lawsuit for rejecting an African American AP history course from the state's curriculum.

entries.title: Washington lawmakers hear testimony on 7 abortion bills
entries.description: Abortion rights proposals were front and center this week in Olympia, Washington, as state lawmakers heard hours of public testimony on seven proposals that would reinforce abortion access

entries.title: WATCH:  Baby gorilla stands up for 1st time with mom's help
entries.description: Bruno, a nearly three-month-old gorilla born at the Fort Worth Zoo in Texas, is seen standing up for the first time—with a helping hand from mom.

entries.title: 'Unimaginable:' 2 children dead, infant hospitalized
entries.description: Officials say a 32—year-old mother in Massachusetts is expected to be charged in the killing of her two children and the injuring of her infant son

entries.title: Senators on intel panel demand to see Biden, Trump docs -- in rare bipartisan outrage
entries.description: Senate Intelligence Committee members threatened to grind the chamber's business to a halt unless they get access to classified documents seized from Biden and Trump

entries.title: Ex-student gets 8 years for spying for Chinese government
entries.description: A former Chicago graduate student was sentenced to eight years in prison Wednesday for spying for the Chinese government by gathering information on scientists and engineers in the U.S. with knowledge about aerospace and satellite technology

entries.title: Governor creates commission to study Arizona prison problems
entries.description: Arizona Gov. Katie Hobbs is creating a commission to study problems in Arizona’s prisons, including staffing levels and the health care offered to inmates

entries.title: Illinois man charged in Planned Parenthood clinic fire
entries.description: A central Illinois man has been charged with setting fire to a Planned Parenthood clinic earlier this month

entries.title: Minnesota woman pleads guilty to leaving newborn to die
entries.description: A Minnesota woman has admitted to leaving her newborn baby to die on the banks of the Mississippi River in 2003
